thread.title: John Myung: How Much Dream Theater Used To Practice Before Making It Big [News]
thread.title_full: John Myung: How Much Dream Theater Used To Practice Before Making It Big [News]

title: John Myung: How Much Dream Theater Used To Practice Before Making It Big [News]
text:
27 minutes ago 2 
John Myung recently discussed Dream Theater's work ethic from back in the day, revealing just how many hours the boys used to spend in the rehearsal room. 
The bassist told Metal Express : "Ever since '85-'86 when me and John went to college and met Mike and formed the band, it was a very intense work ethic that we maintained. From 6 PM to 12 AM every night Monday through Friday, we would always get together and write. 
"We just kept doing it. Four years into it, our first album came out, ' When Day and Dream Unite ' on Mechanic Records. That didn't do all too much. 
"Then four years later, things started happening with ' Images and Words '. All throughout that period, we maintained our work ethic. It was what we did. We didn't know what was happening until it was happening."
